original: dātavyā jīrakeṇa dvipaturaganṛṇāṃ prāṇasaṃrakṣaṇāya kāyāmbhodhir etaṃ rasakasamarasaṃ vaidyanātho 'bhyadhatta // VRrs_12.114 //
analyzed: dātavyā jīrakeṇa dvipa turaga nṛṇām prāṇa saṃrakṣaṇāya kāya ambhodhiḥ etam rasaka samarasam vaidya nāthaḥ bhyadhatta
pācitaḥ vālukāyantre triphalā vyoṣa citrakaiḥ
sa jīrakaiḥ sa indrayavaiḥ pṛthak rasa samaiḥ yutaḥ
māṣa mātraḥ nupānena dvi palasya uṣṇa vāriṇaḥ
abhinyāsa anala bhraṃśa grahaṇī pāṇḍu gulminām
kuryāt prāṇa paritrāṇam atas prāṇeśvaraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: vyādhivṛddhau prayogo 'sya dvau vārau vaidyasaṃmataḥ // VRrs_12.118 //
analyzed: vyādhi vṛddhau prayogaḥ sya dvau vārau vaidya saṃmataḥ
rasa ayaḥ vyoṣa kaṅkuṣṭha śilā tāla abhra hiṅgulān
kumbhī agni bhṛṅgamārī taṇḍulīyaka mākṣikān

original: tryaham ārdrāmbunā piṣṭvā kūpīsthaṃ vālukāgninā // VRrs_12.120 //

analyzed: jayā jambīra nirguṇḍī cāṅgerī vāri nikṣipet
paktvā caturdaśa ahāni piṣṭvā ārdra aktam viśoṣayet
mṛtasaṃjīvanī ākhyaḥ yam rasaḥ

original: drāg jayedauṣadhaṃ saṃnipātādīn sakalān gadān // VRrs_12.122 //
analyzed: jayet auṣadham saṃnipāta ādīn sakalān gadān
rasa bhāgaḥ bhavet ekaḥ gandhakaḥ dviguṇaḥ mataḥ
eṣām pratyekam ekaikam bhāgam ādāya cūrṇayet
ārdrakasya draveṇa eva mardayet ca dina trayam

original: triphalāyāśca nirguṇḍyāḥ pratyekaṃ ca palatrayam // VRrs_12.126 //
analyzed: triphalāyāḥ ca nirguṇḍyāḥ pratyekam ca pala trayam
rasasya pala mātram tu cāṅgeryāḥ parikīrtitam

original: kācakūpyāṃ vinikṣipya yantre kṣiptvā prayatnavān // VRrs_12.127 //
analyzed: kāca kūpyām vinikṣipya yantre kṣiptvā prayatnavān
uddhṛtya ārdraka niryāsaiḥ mardayitvā viśoṣayet
mṛtasaṃjīvanaḥ nāma rasaḥ yam viditaḥ bhuvi
guñjā dvayam dadīta asya saṃnipāta apanuttaye

original: vaṅgaṃ nāgaṃ ca sūtaṃ ca nepālaṃ gandhakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: vaṅgam nāgam ca sūtam ca nepālam gandhakam tathā

original: śulbaṃ viṣaṃ samāṃśena rasenārdreṇa mardayet // VRrs_12.129 //
analyzed: śulbam viṣam sama aṃśena rasena ārdreṇa mardayet
punar nirguṇḍyāḥ cāṅgeryāḥ rasa marditaḥ
valla prayogeṇa rasaḥ yam saṃnipāta nud

original: gandhakaṃ ca rasaṃ śuddhaṃ pratyekaṃ karṣasammitam /
analyzed: ca

original: ekatra kajjalīṃ kṛtvā tataḥ kurvīta golakam // VRrs_12.131 //
analyzed: ekatra kajjalīm kṛtvā tatas kurvīta golakam
nava bhāṇḍe vinikṣipya tāmra pātreṇa gopayet

original: dṛḍhaṃ nirudhya tat pātramagnāvāropayet tataḥ // VRrs_12.132 //
analyzed: dṛḍham nirudhya tat tatas
vrīhi sphuṭana mātreṇa svāṅgaśītam samuddharet
ārdrakasya rasena eva tri vallam tri dinam bhiṣak
jvaritam chādayet gāḍham yāvat svedaḥ samudbhavet
takra bhaktam bhavet pathyam jvara muktasya dehinaḥ
navajvarāriḥ iti eṣa rasaḥ parama durlabhaḥ

original: vātajvare viśeṣeṇa rasaḥ sādhāraṇo mataḥ // VRrs_12.135 //
analyzed: vāta jvare viśeṣeṇa rasaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ mataḥ
ṭaṅkaṇam rasa gandhau ca maricāni sama aṃśakam

original: sarvaṃ jambīranīreṇa dināni trīṇi mardayet // VRrs_12.136 //
analyzed: sarvam jambīra nīreṇa dināni trīṇi mardayet
saṃśoṣya śarkarā yuktam matsya pittena bhāvayet
bhāvitam tad rasam siddham ārdraka svarasaiḥ tri aham

original: vallaṃ vāratrayaṃ deyaṃ pānārthaṃ vāri śītalam /

analyzed: takra bhaktam bhavet pathyam vṛntāka phala saṃyutam

original: sarvān navajvarān hanti raso 'yaṃ jalamañjarī // VRrs_12.138 //
analyzed: sarvān navajvarān hanti rasaḥ yam jalamañjarī
kāntasya kaṇṭavedhyānām pātrāṇām bhasma kārayet
tad samaḥ ca rasaḥ gandhaḥ ṭaṅkaṇaḥ nimba vāriṇā

original: tataḥ saṃpeṣya tatkalkaṃ mardayettridinaṃ punaḥ // VRrs_12.139 //
analyzed: tatas saṃpeṣya tad kalkam mardayet tri dinam punar
rasa tulyena matsyasya pittena paribhāvayet
siddhaḥ kāntarasaḥ hi eṣa prayojyaḥ bhinava jvare
śṛṅgavera anupānena mātrayā bhiṣaj uttamaiḥ
rasa gandhau tathā vaṅgam abhrakam sama bhāgataḥ

original: melayitvātha vaṅgena samaṃ sūtaṃ vimardayet // VRrs_12.141 //
analyzed: melayitvā atha vaṅgena samam sūtam vimardayet
tatra ekīkṛtya gandha abhre peṣyam jambīra vāriṇā

original: sāmānyaṃ puṭam ādadyāt saptadhā sādhitaṃ rasam // VRrs_12.142 //
analyzed: sāmānyam puṭam ādadyāt saptadhā sādhitam rasam
kumāryā citrakeṇa api bhāvayitvā atha saptadhā

original: guḍena jīrakeṇāpi jvare jīrṇe prayojayet // VRrs_12.143 //
analyzed: guḍena jīrakeṇa api jvare jīrṇe prayojayet
kāse śvāse kumāryā ca triphalā kvātha yogataḥ
unmādam ca dhanurvātam amṛtā kvātha yogataḥ
iti evam roga tāpa ghnaḥ rasaḥ candrodaya abhidhaḥ

original: nāgaṃ vaṅgaṃ rasaṃ tāmraṃ gandhakaṃ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: nāgam vaṅgam rasam tāmram gandhakam ṭaṅkaṇam tathā

original: viṣaṃ ca nepālaṃ haritālaṃ samaṃ tathā // VRrs_12.145 //
analyzed: viṣam ca nepālam haritālam samam tathā
vaṭa kṣīreṇa saṃmardya sarvam kuryāt tu golakam
tam golakam bhāṇḍa madhye pācayet dīpa vahninā

original: taṃ golaṃ śītalaṃ kṛtvā bhṛṅgarājena mardayet /
analyzed: tam golam śītalam kṛtvā bhṛṅgarājena mardayet

original: ārdrakasya rasenāpi mardayecca punaḥ punaḥ // VRrs_12.147 //
analyzed: ārdrakasya rasena api mardayet ca punar punar
caṇa pramāṇa vaṭakān rasena ārdrasya dāpayet
guñjā dvaya pramāṇena jvaram jīrṇam harati asau

original: haraśca gandhakaṃ caiva kunaṭī ca samaṃ samam /
analyzed: haraḥ ca gandhakam ca eva kunaṭī ca samam samam
mardyam karkoṭikāyāḥ ca rasena viniyojayet
taṇḍulīya rasena anupānam śarkarayā api vā
